mapper.select: select max(no)+1 as no from board
mapper.insert: insert into board(no, id, title, contents) values(#{no}, #{id}, #{title},#{contents})
mapper.select: select no, id, title, contents, date_format(regdate, '%y-%m-%d') as regdate from board where no = #{no}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where no=#{no}
